name: @aws/chat-client-ui-types
description: Type definitions for Chat UIs in Language Servers and Runtimes for AWS

scripts.compile: echo 'INFO: Running ui-types compile' && pwd && tsc --build
scripts.prepub:copyFiles: echo 'INFO: Running ui-types copyFiles' && pwd && shx cp ../LICENSE ../NOTICE ../SECURITY.md .
scripts.prepub: echo 'INFO: Running ui-types prepub' && pwd && npm run clean && npm run compile && npm run prepub:copyFiles
scripts.pub: echo 'INFO: Running ui-types pub' && pwd && npm publish

author: Amazon Web Services
